title: DAYCHANGE / TEQUILA BED
description: The dialogue between You and your bed. You can sleep, not sleep, read your ledger.

dialogueTree.title: Bed: "The bed is comforting, if a bit run..."
dialogueTree.text: The bed is comforting, if a bit run down. Still, you've earned a rest.

links.title: Bed: "The sheets feel at once coarse and..."
links.text: The sheets feel at once coarse and clammy against your skin. The bed sags beneath your weight as you stretch out and finally close your eyes...

links.title: Bed: "The sheets feel at once coarse and..."
links.text: The sheets feel at once coarse and clammy against your skin. The bed sags beneath your weight as you stretch out and finally close your eyes...

links.title: Bed: "Across the room, the heating system..."
links.text: Across the room, the heating system hums its soft lullaby. The mattress feels soft and sheets warm. It only takes you moments for the world to fall away...

links.title: Bed: "The window is fixed, the sheets are..."
links.text: The window is fixed, the sheets are new, it's easier to fall asleep than ever before...

links.title: Bed: "The passage of time has not made th..."
links.text: The passage of time has not made the sheets any less coarse. The bed sags beneath your weight as you close your eyes and drift off into an uneasy sleep...

links.title: Tutorial Agent: "The option to go to sleep becomes a..."
links.text: The option to go to sleep becomes available every night after 21.00.

dialogueTree.title: Bed: "The bed's a little nicer now. You c..."
dialogueTree.text: The bed's a little nicer now. You could get a good night's sleep here.

dialogueTree.title: Bed: "The bed is still cold from the brok..."
dialogueTree.text: The bed is still cold from the broken window, and not too inviting. But it's yours. You've earned it.

dialogueTree.title: Bed: "The bed is cold and not particularl..."
dialogueTree.text: The bed is cold and not particularly inviting, but it's yours. The sheets look awful...
